short_summary: The requirement is for services of a senior SAP Business Intelligence/business object developer.
description: The requirement is for the services of a senior SAP Business Intelligence/business object (BI/BOBJ) developer and a senior SAP Business Warehouse \\& Integrated Planning (BW-IP) Developer in order to successfully manage a SAP BW-IP/BI/BOBJ solution at the Canadian Heritage (PCH) instance.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal (RFP): Task-Based Informatics Professional Services
#### Notice Reference: PW-23-01025068

Canadian Heritage, a Government of Canada institution, is inviting proposals from qualified contractors to provide Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS).

**Solicitation Details**

* **Solicitation Number:** 10222412
* **Publication Date:** February 8, 2023
* **Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Trade Agreements:** This tender is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

**Scope of Work**

The requirement is for the services of a senior SAP Business Intelligence/Business Object (BI/BOBJ) developer and a senior SAP Business Warehouse & Integrated Planning (BW-IP) Developer to manage a SAP BW-IP/BI/BOBJ solution at Canadian Heritage. The contract period will be for one (1) year, with the option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

**Eligibility**

This tender is open to all qualified contractors who have demonstrated expertise in providing TBIPS and meet the prescribed eligibility criteria.

**Proposal Submission**

Proposals must be submitted in accordance with the requirements outlined in the RFP document. Late or incomplete proposals will not be accepted.

**Contracting Authority**

Canadian Heritage is the contracting authority for this RFP. For all inquiries, please contact:

Contact Person: Nicole Sabourin  
Email: contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca  

**Attachment**

The RFP document can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/2494ade4295502b7c1aeea27c5277ba0/10222412_tbips_npp_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/08/2494ade429550
